content.text: A comprehensive platform that helps artists and managers easily connect with and recruit creative talent. This project focuses on streamlining the collaboration process, from discovery to contract negotiation and project management.

The platform includes intuitive dashboards for both artists and managers, robust search and filtering capabilities, secure messaging, and integrated portfolio showcases. Designed with a minimalist aesthetic to highlight artistic works.

nextWorkDescription: An AI-powered web app to simulate table reads for film scripts.
